pullRequest.title: Port the second transaction query optimization from release/0.23

Fixes #

commit.message:
Add timestamp conditions to the transaction table in the transactions inner query

Signed-off-by: Xin Li <xin.li@swirlds.com>

nodes.bodyText: Is this intentional to have tsParams concatenated twice?
Ah, I was confused because I was thinking it was the query which included the column name, but it's just the timestamp itself passed twice. Makes sense.
